languages.text: "Сие требуется всегда, но время и цель назначает Неумирающий". {n}Кибелла отвечает с достоинством, явно не замечая зловещей двусмысленности своих слов.{/n}
"Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сие требуется всегда, но время и цель назначает Неумирающий". {n}Кибелла отвечает с достоинством, явно не замечая зловещей двусмысленности своих слов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}
"Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

"Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

languages.text: «Siempre es el caso. En cuanto a quién lo recibirá y cuándo, solo el Inmortal lo sabe». {n}Kibellah responde con dignidad, ignorando aparentemente la siniestra insinuación de sus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Siempre es el caso. En cuanto a quién lo recibirá y cuándo, solo el Inmortal lo sabe». {n}Kibellah responde con dignidad, ignorando aparentemente la siniestra insinuación de sus palabras.{/n}

languages.text: 「誰かがいつもやっています。誰がいつやるのかは、不死の者が教えてくださるでしょう」{n}キベラは尊重を込めて答えた。彼女は自身の言葉の不吉さに、まるで気づいていないようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誰かがいつもやっています。誰がいつやるのかは、不死の者が教えてくださるでしょう」{n}キベラは尊重を込めて答えた。彼女は自身の言葉の不吉さに、まるで気づいていないようだった。{/n}

languages.text: “总会有人受到惩处。至于那个人是谁，什么时候受到惩处，不死之神会开口的。”{n}绮贝菈带着尊严回应道，似乎并没有意识到她的话语听起来有多么不祥。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “总会有人受到惩处。至于那个人是谁，什么时候受到惩处，不死之神会开口的。”{n}绮贝菈带着尊严回应道，似乎并没有意识到她的话语听起来有多么不祥。{/n}

languages.text: "Jemanden trifft es immer. Wen und wann, bestimmt der Todlose." {n}Kibellahs Antwort erfolgt würdevoll und anscheinend in Unkenntnis, wie düster sie klingt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Jemanden trifft es immer. Wen und wann, bestimmt der Todlose." {n}Kibellahs Antwort erfolgt würdevoll und anscheinend in Unkenntnis, wie düster sie klingt.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est toujours le cas. Quant à savoir quand exactement Sa vengeance s'abattra sur l'infidèle, l'Immortel nous le dira. » {n}Kibellah répond avec dignité, inconsciente semble-t-il de la dureté de ses propos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est toujours le cas. Quant à savoir quand exactement Sa vengeance s'abattra sur l'infidèle, l'Immortel nous le dira. » {n}Kibellah répond avec dignité, inconsciente semble-t-il de la dureté de ses propos.{/n}

languages.text: "Her zaman cezaya çarptırılan birisi olur. Kim ve ne zaman olacağını ise yalnızca Ölmeyen söyler." {n}Kibellah, vakurlukla yanıt veriyor. Sözlerinin kulağa ne kadar uğursuz geldiğinden bihaber görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Someone always does. As for who and when, the Undying One will tell." {n}Kibellah responds with dignity, seemingly oblivious to how sinister her words sound.{/n}
